A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I hated this movie. This is a franchise breaking film. This movie is such a slap in the face for anyone who waited 30 years to see Luke Skywalker on screen again that I threw away my copy of the force awakens. The turned the greatest hero in Star Wars into a cowardly loser that refuses to help his family\, then he pointlessly dies at the end\, such a huge disappointment and insult.
